http://purl.org/dc/terms/description.@value: An ontology representing scanners and instruments used to make measurements in the ENIGMA consortium.

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: Axial

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: The acquisition direction of a scanner

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: ENIGMA-Sulci

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: The protocol used to acquire the scanner data types

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: ADNI: Alzheimerâ€™s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: A group of individuals studied by a working group, limited by certain inclusion and exclusion criteria
Specifies the kinds of data collected

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: FEEsequence

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: A particular setting of pulse sequences and pulsed field gradients within an MRI

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: Siemens

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Manufacturer of the scanner

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Scanner used to scan the members of the cohort

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: FreeSurfer5.1.0

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: The software associated with a given scanner

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: Antidepressants

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Treatments used on the members of the cohort

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: AcquisitionPro3 forDataType EEG

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes what data type the acquisition protocol was used to obtain

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasAcquisitionDirection coronal --> The acquisition direction of this 1.5T-GE-Signa is coronal

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the acquisition direction of the scanner

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasDataAcquisitionMatrix "256x256" --> The size of the data acquisition matrix is 256x256

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the size of the data acquisition matrix used

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasFieldStrength 1.5 --> The field strength of 1.5T-GE-Signa is 1.5

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the field strength of the cohort

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasFlipAngle 7 --> 1.5T-GE-Signa has a flip angle of 7 in degrees

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the flip angle of a scanner in degrees

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasFoV "X*Y*Z"

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the field of view of the acquisition protocol

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasManufacturer GE --> The manufacturer of the 1.5T-GE-Signa is GE

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes what the manufacturer for the scanner is

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasNEX 1 --> The acquisition protocol for this scanner had one number of excitations

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the number of excitiations of the acquisition protocol of the scanner

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasNumberOfEchoes 2 --> 1.5T-GE-Signa has 2 echoes

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the number of echoes of the acquisition protocol of a scanner

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasNumberOfSlices 182 --> This scanner has 182 slices

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the number of slices of the particular scanner

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasResolution "0.9x0.9" --> The resolution of this scanner is 0.9mm x 0.9mm

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the in-plane pixel resolution in mm x mm

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasScanTime 42 --> The scan time for 1.5T-GE-Signa is 42 seconds

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the scan time of the acquisition protocol for a scanner in seconds

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasSequence T1-weighted_MPRAGE_sequence --> The acquisition protocol for this scanner is T1-weighted MPRAGE sequence

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the sequence that the acquisition protocol requires

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasSliceThickness 1 --> The slice thickness of this scanner is 1 mm

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the slice thickness of the scanner in mm

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasTE 4.6 --> 1.5T-GE-Signa has TE of 4.6 ms

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the TE of a scanner in ms

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasTI 710 --> 1.5T-GE-Signa has a TI of 710 ms

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the TI of a scanner in ms

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasTR 500 --> 1.5T-GE-Signa has a TR of 500 ms

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the TR of a scanner in ms

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa hasVoxelSize "1x1x1" --> 1.5T-GE-Signa has voxel size of 1x1x1 mm

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the voxel height of a scanner in mm

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: AcquisitionProtocol isAcquisitionProtocolOf Cohort1

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes what cohorts were scanned with the acquisition protocol

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa isScannerModel "Signa" --> The scanner model for 1.5T-GE-Signa is Signa

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes what the scanner model is

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Siemens isScannerOf AcquisitionProtocol1

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes the protocols that the scanner is used for

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa usedBodyCoil true --> This 1.5T-GE-Signa scanner used a body coil to scan

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes if a body coil was used to scan by the scanner

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: 1.5T-GE-Signa usedHeadCoil true --> This 1.5T-GE-Signa scanner used a head coil to scan

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes if a head coil was used to scan by the scanner

http://purl.org/vocab/vann/example.@value: Cohort1 usesScannerSoftware FreeSurfer(5.1.0) --> Cohort1 was scanned with FreeSurfer(5.1.0) software

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: Describes what the software was used for a given scanner
